QuestData.Title: The Captain's Cache
QuestData.Description:
Well, I'm sure you've figured it out by now, eh?
I never was fixing to abandon the crew, I just wanted to move up the ranks. You've helped me out a great deal in that respect.
Speaking of respect, I believe there's the matter of Captain Hartford's lockbox...
Here's the code, courtesy of the fallen captain. Just as I promised. It's all yours!
Now, don't go telling anyone about our little arrangement, okay? I wouldn't want something like that to spoil such a profitable partnership!
